abstract: Araki's portraits of Haruki Murakami in this week's magazine
snippet: Araki's portraits of Haruki Murakami in this week's magazine
lead_paragraph: In this week's magazine, Sam Anderson delves into the bewitching universe of the literary powerhouse Haruki Murakami, whose new book, 1Q84, will be released in North America on Oct. 25. Before you become completely distracted by Murakami's unforgettable characters and layered cultural references, take a moment to notice the photographs contributed by a second artistic giant - the acclaimed Japanese photographer Nobuyoshi Araki. He took the gorgeous, tightly-focused black-and-white portraits of Murakami.

headline.main: Spot the Other Artistic Giant on the Cover
